languages-and-frameworks.description: We've placed development languages here, as well as frameworks, which are used for implementing different feature in Typeform.

data.description: Here we put information of the ecosystem which we use to maintain our data, like Databases, cache etc.

platform-and-infra.description: This quadrant clusters technologies around the infrastructure and related platforms.

tools.description: Here we put different software tools - not only used in engineering but in whole Typeform
